definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fly (NH id., (rare) flicker, flutter, [[עוֹף]] fowl; Aram. [[עוֹפָא]], 9uwpo0 id.; Eth. 0of: id.; Ar. 9awfun augury, from birds (cf. We:Heid. 2, 202), fortune, 9if, 9a0fa practice augury, 9a0y’ifun augur; also 9wf, 9a0fa fly about, of birds);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[וְעָפוּ]] consec. Is 11:14; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇעוּף]] Job 20:8, Ps 91:5 + Pr 23:5 b Qr (> Kt [[ועוף]] [van d. H.], or [[ועיף]] [Ginsb]); [[וַיׇּעָׂף]] 2Sa 22:11 = Ps 18:11, Na 3:16, [[וַיׇּ֫עָף]] Is 6:6; 3 fs. [[תָעוּף]]([[הֲ]]) Pr 23:5 a Kt (v. infr.); 3 fpl. [[תְּעוּפֶינׇה]] Is 60:8, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[עוּף]] Job 5:7, Pr 26:2; Pt. fs. [[עָפָה]] Zec 5:1, Zec 5:2; pl. [[עָפוֹת]] Is 31:5; —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: fly, of birds De 4:17, specif. of swallow (in sim.) Pr 26:2 (‖[[נוּד]]); of seraph Is 6:6 (cf.

definitions.title: Pō‘1.
definitions.body: ); ´[[י]] riding ([[רכב]]) on cherub 2Sa 22:11 = Ps 18:11; roll (in vision) Zec 5:1, Zec 5:2; arrow Ps 91:5; of swift army Is 11:14 (under fig. of bird, sq. [[בְּכָתֵף]]) Hb Hab 1:8 (sim. of vulture); fig. of ships (like cloud, or doves) Is 60:8; [[בְּנֵי־רֶשֶׁף יַגְבִּיהוּ עוּף]] Job 5:7 make high to fly, i.e. make their flight high, soar aloft (sim. of irresistible tendency).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: hover (protectingly) Is 31:5 (birds, sim. of ´[[י]]; on sense cf. De 32:11).

fly away, to a distance, Ps 55:7 (fig.; ‖[[אַרְחִיק נְדׂד]] v:Ps 55:8); = vanish, of locusts Na 1:16 (fig.); [[כְּנֶשֶׁר יׇעוּף הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Pr 23:5 b (Qr) sim. of riches (v. Toy); of wicked Job 20:8 ([[כַּחֲלוֹם]]); end of life, in gen., [[וַנׇּעָֻפָה]] Ps 90:10.—[[הֲתָעוּף]] Pr 23:5 a Kt, do thine eyes fly (light) upon it ? ([[הֲתָעִיף]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Qr dost thou cause thine eyes to fly, etc. ?) is difficult, and line perhaps not original (v. Toy).

definitions.title: Pō‘l. 1.
definitions.body: fly about, to and fro; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְעוֹפֵף]] of birds Ge 1:20 (P); seraphim Is 6:2; Pt. [[שָׂרָף מְעוֹפֵף]] flying fiery serpent Is 14:29, Is 30:6.
cause to fly to and fro, brandish, Inf. cstr. sf. [[בְּעוֹפְפִי]] [[חַרְבִּי]] Ez Eze 32:10 when I brandish my sword before them.

definitions.title: Hithpō‘l.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[כָּעוֹף יִתְעוֹפֵף]] [[כְּבוֹדָם]] Ho 9:11 like a bird their glory shall fly away.
